name: 8 Channel Surveillance DVR with 4 Cameras and Mobile Monitoring Capabilities
accessoriesincluded: (1) 8 channel H.264 DVR, (1) 500 GB hard drive, (4) indoor/outdoor color cameras with infrared night vision, (4) 60 ft. camera cables, (1) 1-to-5 way splitter power cable, (1) 12V/5A power adapter, (1) mouse with USB cable, (1) remote control
